about_the_game:
Vampires can live toxin-free with HiCorp's new Synthetic Blood. But there are always some that can't change...

Feel the fury
Music will pump blood directly into your loins to invigorate your inner BADASS with every burst of vampire embers!

Show 'em your stuff
Bring your dexterity and muscles to the party, delivering killer moves close and personal. Show them what you're made of...and what they're made of!

Customise your weapon
Customising your loadout to fit your playstyle to deliver maximum IMPACT!

Rebirth
Replaying is essential in this ROGUELIKE. Learn. Adapt. Retry. Retry again. Find that inner HERO to kick back at evil and uncover the truth behind the psychotic cult.

Created by a solo developer influenced by Duke Nukem, Fallout, Borderlands, John Wick, Blade, The Raid.

content_descriptors.notes:
The content is expected to have gore, but likely options to turn off blood to make it more palatable.
The vampires will have a combust effect, so it is very must set in a fictional world, and not aimed to cause any distress to the players.
